1.name: Easy Prey

1.longDescription: Increases Misha's basic attack damage to Minions and Mercenaries by 200%, and Misha gains 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing damage taken by 50%.

4.name: Hunter-Gatherer

4.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Rexxar's Health Regeneration by 1.25 per second, up to 25 per second.  Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, Rexxar and Misha gain 15 Armor.

7.longDescription: Misha's Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Misha, Charge! by 1.00 second.

10.name: Unleash the Boars

10.longDescription: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 114 damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

13.longDescription: When Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, Rexxar gains 125% Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Misha's Basic Attacks increase the duration of this buff by 0.75 seconds.

13.longDescription: Rexxar and Misha's Basic Attacks increase the damage of the next Misha, Charge! by 15%, stacking up to a 150% bonus.

16.longDescription: Rexxar's Basic Attacks increase both his and Misha's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

20.name: Frenzy of Kalimdor
20.description: Rexxar's Basic Attacks deal 10% more damage, and Misha's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1.25 seconds.
20.longDescription: Rexxar's Basic Attacks deal 10% more damage, and Misha's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1.25 seconds.

abilities.name: Misha, Focus!
abilities.description: Passive:Misha gains 15% move speed. Command Misha to attack a specific enemy or move to a point and wait. Targeting Rexxar commands Misha to retreat to his position, gaining 30% move speed until she reaches Rexxar. Targeting Misha commands her to hold her current position.Type: -Targeting: Point target / Unit targetProperties: ClampingCast time: InstantRadius: GlobalMishaType: SummonProperties: Heroic PetStatistics: Data:MishaSight radius: 7Leash radius: 17.25Killing Misha rewards a Takedown credit and 0.25 Hero kills/XP.Killing Rexxar rewards a Takedown credit and 0.75 Hero kills/XP, when Misha is dead. If Misha is alive while Rexxar is killed, she dies as well, totaling a full Hero kill/XP.Rexxar becomes is unable to control Misha, while he is unable to act (Stunned, Dazed or put in Time Stop or Stasis, other than Feign Death) or Silenced.If Rexxar enters a vehicle or is some other way removed from the battleground, Misha will be removed from the Battleground as well.Issuing Move and Attack commands to Misha doesn't break channels, using abilities will.Rexxar and Misha share the effects of Healing Fountains and Regeneration Globes.

4.longDescription: Deal 14 damage per second to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase this damage by 20% for 3 seconds. This can stack up to 3 times.

7.longDescription: Being Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced grants Uther 90 Mana and causes Holy Light's cooldown to recharge 200.000% faster for 6.0 seconds. This effect has a 20 second cooldown.

7.longDescription: Healing a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced increases the Armor bonus they receive from Devotion from 25 to 50.

7.longDescription: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on Uther. Basic Attacks reduce Hand of Protection's cooldown by 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Molten Core
abilities.description: Channel on an allied or destroyed Fort or Keep to replace it with Ragnaros's ultimate form, temporarily gaining new Abilities, having 3996 Health that burns away over 18 seconds. Ragnaros returns to his normal form upon losing all Health in Molten Core.Type: TransformationScaling: 4.00% (health & decay)Affects: Allied or destroyed Forts & KeepsTargeting: Unit targetProperties: Channeled cast, Heroic Target, StasisCast time: 2(ch)+0 secondsRange: 5.75Health decay: 222 per secondInterrupting Molten Core during its cast puts it on 10 second cooldown.Entering Molten Core puts real Ragnaros in a special Stasis, removing most debuffs and making him untargetable and immune to damage until Molten Core ends.Ragnaros can exit Molten Core after a 1 second channel by reactivating the Trait. Exiting can be cancelled by pressing the Trait button again before channel is complete.Ragnaros cannot be targeted by friendly abilities during Molten Core, but buffs and HoTs applied before hand persist for their duration.Molten Core Ragnaros cannot be targeted or affected by Abathur's Ultimate Evolution, Sylvanas' Black Arrow disable or Zagara's Devouring Maw.

abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon an Ultralisk that rushes foward upon spawning, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds. The Ultralisk's Basic Attacks deal 50% of their damage in an area around their target. Reactivate to retarget the Ultralisk.Ultralisk is a mobile Summon.Attack speed:  1.00.Health: 1369 (+4% per level)Summoning Ultralisk while Kerrigan is affected by Spell Power buff/debuff, increases/decreases Ultralisk's Basic Attack damage. Gaining or losing Ability Power after Ultralisk is summoned does not affect it.

1.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 50% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. This is increased to 100% while Inspire is active.

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.description: Zul'jin channels to regenerate 30% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds. Moving while channeling or taking damage will interrupt this effect.Damage over Time effects applied before cast do not interrupt Regeneration.

abilities.name: Taz'dingo
abilities.description: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

Maximum bonus damage is 200%.

If Murky's Egg is killed, he is revealed to enemies for 15 seconds, and Spawn Egg is placed on cooldown.

abilities.name: Slime

Deals 50% less damage to Structures.The Pufferfish can be targeted and attacked by Structures The Pufferfish is not targeted by minions, mercanaries or monsters.

abilities.name: Safety Bubble

Each Murloc deals 125 (+4% per level) damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.

abilities.name: Octo-Grab

abilities.name: Carrion Swarm
abilities.description: After 1 second, disperse into an Invulnerable swarm of bats for 3 seconds, dealing 126 damage per second to enemies. Vampiric Touch heals for 75% of Carrion Swarm's damage to Heroes.Type: Damage / Status EffectScaling: 4.00% / -Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Channeled cast (mobile), StasisArea of Effect: Cone x3Radius: 4Arc: 45 degreesTickrate: 2 / s (x6)Damage per tick: 63 / sInterrupting the ability during its cast puts it on a 10 second cooldown.Carrion Swarm's damage area consists of three cones in "opposite" directions that rotate every 0.0625 between three possible orientations. Regardless, enemies can only be damaged by the ability only once every 0.5 seconds.Malganis can move, but not use abilities while channeling and during Carrion Swarm.Carrion Swarm removes most negative effects from Mal'Ganis once the channel finishes and Mal'Ganis enters Stasis.

abilities.name: Dark Conversion
abilities.description: Channel on an enemy Hero for 0.75 seconds, then swap Health percentages with the target over 3 seconds.Type: Damage / HealingScaling: -Affects: Enemy Non-Vehicle Heroes / SelfTargeting: Unit TargetProperties: Channeled cast (stationary), Damage over time, Heal over time, Percent damageCast time: 0.75+0.15 secondsRange: 3.75Tickrate: 2 / s (x6)First, the ability examines both units' life percent. They get assigned HigherHealth (HH) and LowerHealth (LH). Now their current health is "saved", and a new health is now assigned. HH new health is LH's current health percent, while LH new health is HH current (note these are variables, no damage is done yet). Now two new variables are set, SwapDamage, which is HHcurrent-HHnew and SwapHeal, which is LHnew-LHcurrent, this is done to change from percent to a flat ammount. A DoT of SwapDamage strength is made for HH, and SwapHeal HoT for LH. A visual effect is created then if HH is the casting unit (to add insult to injury).The HoT/DoT ticks 6 times over 3 seconds. Once every 0.5 seconds.Since both the DoT and HoT are flat ammounts, this means that they're both affected by anything that affects those effects. Armor reduces the damage, it can be dispelled by effects like Valeera's Cloak of Shadows, and you can multiply the heal by effects such as Valeera's Wound Poison. If the DoT is removed, you'll still get healed. If both heroes have the exact same hp percent, then Mal'Ganis gets a 0 damage DoT while the opponent gets a 0 damage HoT.Interrupting the ability puts it on a 10 second cooldown.Cast is interrupted, if the target moves 3 range past its maximum range.Dark Conversion damage is not affected by the lifesteal from Vampiric Touch.If Mal'Ganis has higher percentage of health than the target enemy hero, the ability will damage Mal'Ganis while healing enemy hero. It can even deal fatal damage to Mal'Ganis.

abilities.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 (+4% per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.Drakken Laser Drill is a stationary Summon.Damage is dealt every 0.5 seconds in ticks of 71 damage Spell damage.Drakken Laser Drill takes 2 seconds to set up. This makes its effective duration 20 seconds.Drakken Laser Drill has 1255 (+4% per level) Health.Cooldown starts when the ability is cast.

abilities.name: Commandeer Odin
abilities.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.It takes Tychus 2.75 seconds to enter the Odin, during which Tychus is Unstoppable. Armor bonus is instant.While piloting Odin, Tychus' Basic attack damage is set to 191 (+4% per level) and Attack Speed to 1.00/s.Tychus cannot use Minigun and Sizzling Attacks while piloting Odin.Odin's attack speed benefits from Master Assassin talent.Odin's Abilities use no mana.Cooldown starts when the ability is cast.

1.name: Chop Meat

4.longDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Ruthless Onslaught by 33% upon impact.

7.longDescription: Every time a nearby enemy minion dies, The Butcher heals 5% of his maximum health.

10.name: Lamb to the Slaughter

13.longDescription: Ruthless Onslaught deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 10% of their maximum Health.

16.longDescription: While below 50% of his maximum Health, taking damage causes The Butcher to become Enraged for 10 seconds, gaining 40% Attack Speed and 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%.This effect has a 25 second cooldown.

abilities.name: Fresh Meat
abilities.description: Upon dying nearby enemy Minions drop 1 Fresh Meat and enemy heroes drop 20 Fresh Meat. Fresh Meat can be picked up to gain 0.5 bonus Attack Damage per Meat. The Butcher loses 15 Fresh Meat upon dying.❢  Quest: Collect 200 Fresh Meat.❢ Reward: Gain an additional 125 Attack Damage and 25% increased Attack Speed. Heroes continue to drop 10 Fresh Meat, Minions no longer drop Fresh Meat, and Fresh meat is no longer lost on death.Bonus damage from Fresh Meat is affected by damage multiplication, but not by Scaling.

abilities.name: Hamstring
abilities.description: Deal 110 (+4% per level) damage and Slow enemies by 50% fading over 2 seconds. The Butcher's next Basic Attack will strike immediately.

abilities.name: Butcher's Brand
abilities.description: Deal 37 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and Brand them for 4 seconds. The Butcher's Basic Attacks against the Branded target heal him for 75% of the damage done.Basic Attacks against Branded Heroes heal for double and extend the duration of the Brand by 0.5 seconds.Cannot be applied to Structures.Healing is calculated after Armor reductions and other damage modifications.

abilities.name: Ruthless Onslaught
abilities.description: Charge at an enemy, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed. If The Butcher reaches the target, they are Stunned for 1 second and take 119 (+4% per level) damage.Cannot target Structures.Charge can be manually cancelled by reactivating the ability.Charge is automaitcally cancelled, if it has been active for 4 seconds without hitting the target or if the target becomes untargetable.

abilities.name: Furnace Blast
abilities.description: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around The Butcher dealing 500 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

abilities.name: Lamb to the Slaughter
abilities.description: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay.  This deals 171 (+4% per level) damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post and Silenced for 3 seconds.Chained enemies will be pulled towards the center, if they try to escape the area.

16.longDescription: D.Va gains the Torpedo Dash ability, allowing her to dash forward and pass through enemies.Requires Pilot Mode.

abilities.name: Mech Mode
abilities.description: When D.Va's Mech is destroyed, she is ejected after 0.75 seconds and can continue to fight in Pilot Mode. Destroying D.Va's Mech only awards 50% of a normal Hero's XP.Attack area length: 3.75Attack area width: 2

abilities.name: Pilot Mode
abilities.description: Each Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Call Mech by 0.5 seconds. As a Pilot, D.Va only awards 50% of a normal Hero's XP upon death.D.Va can Mount while in Pilot Mode.

abilities.name: Boosters (Mech Mode)
abilities.description: Increases D.Va's Movement Speed by 125% for 2 seconds. Enemies that are hit take 135 damage and are knocked away.D.Va cannot be Slowed while Boosters are active, and each enemy can only be hit once per use.Type: Damage / Mobility: DashScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: No targetProperties: Knockback, Mobile channel, Movement Speed buffCast time: InstantKnockback distance: 2Knockback duration: 0.1875 secondsReactivate: Cancel Boosters - Cancels BoostersThe movement speed during Boosters is calculated after the 100% baseline, and therefore is 225%, instead of 210%.

abilities.name: Defense Matrix (Mech Mode)
abilities.description: Channel a defensive field in the target direction for 3 seconds, reducing damage dealt by enemy Heroes inside it by 75%. The Mech can move while channeling, but cannot turn.Damage dealt to the Mech by enemies within Defense Matrix still grants the same amount of Self-Destruct Charge.Type: Damage modifier: DebuffScaling: -Affects: Enemy HeroesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, Mobile channelCast time: 0.125+0 secondsOffset range: 0.5Lenght: 6.5Inner width: 2Outer width: 6Reactivate: Cancel Defense Matrix - Cancels Defense Matrix.Once cast the direction D.Va is facing is locked, but is otherwise able to move freely.The debuff lasts 0.3 seconds, and is reapplied every 0.0625s (reapplying refreshes the duration). So if enemies walk out of your Defense Matrix and try to deal damage immediately after, the 75% damage reduction is still applied.Defense Matrix reduces the damage of enemy heroes in the area at the time. All other times or areas are redundant. E.g. if an enemy Kael'thas cast Pyroblast, use Defense Matrix on Kael’thas when the pyroblast hits.Defense Matrix does not work on percentage damage abilities, vehicles and non-heroic targets like structures, minions and mercanaries.

abilities.name: Self-Destruct
abilities.description: Requires Mech Mode. Eject from the Mech, setting it to self-destruct after 4 seconds. Deals 400 to 1200 damage in a large area, depending on distance from the center of the blast. Deals 50% damage against Structures.Gain 1% Charge for every 2 seconds spent using Basic Attacks, and 30% Charge per 100% of Mech Health lost.Type: DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: No targetProperties: Area of Effect, KnockbackCast time: InstantRadius: 10Knockback distance: 3Knockback duration: 0.1875 secondsThe Explosion deals 1200 damage to the closest enemies, while the furthest enemies are hit for 400 at 10 range.Can be activated while Boosters are active, and Boosters can be deactivated after leaving the Mech.If Mech has taken fatal damage Self-Destruct can not be used, unless Boosters are active.Successfully casting Self-Destruct reduces Call Mech's cooldown to 4 seconds and turns D.Va's Mech into an Unkillable Heroic Pet.Ejected Mech can be affected by Crowd Control, including Polymorph, and Stasis effects like Stitches' Gorge.Crowd Control effects neither delay nor suppress Mech's explosion, they can only affect its position. The explosion can only be delayed by the Time Stop effect.Using Self-Destruct to eject from the Mech awards no experience to enemies.Attacking multiple targets at the same time does not increase charge gained.

abilities.name: Call Mech
abilities.description: Requires Pilot Mode. Call a new Mech and enter Mech Mode. 45 second cooldown. While in Pilot Mode, each Basic Attack lowers this cooldown by 0.5 seconds.Type: -Scaling: -Affects: SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Channeled cast (stationary)Cast time: 0.5+0 secondsEntering the Mech successfully fully heals D.Va's pilot form and removes most debuffs.Interruoting Call Mech during it's cast puts it on a 4-second cooldown.

abilities.name: Bunny Hop
abilities.description: Requires Mech Mode.  D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 60 damage and Slowing enemies by 40%. Lasts 4 seconds.Type: DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: No targetProperties: Area of Effect, Mobile channel, Unstoppable, SlowCast time: InstantRadius: 5Reactivate: Cancel Bunny Hop - Cancels Bunny Hop

abilities.name: Mechanized Walker
abilities.description: While in her Mech, D.Va can shoot while moving, but her base movement speed is reduced by 15%.

abilities.name: Ogre Hide
abilities.description: Activate to gain 25 Armor, but reduce Gall's damage by 25%.Type: Damage modifier: Armor, DamageAffects: Self, GallTargeting: No targetCast time: InstantThe ability is placed on cooldown once Gall activates Ogre Rage.

abilities.name: Surging Fist
abilities.description: Activate to begin charging Surging Fist. Activate again to dash forward, knocking aside enemies and dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage. The dash range increases by up to 250%, depending on how long it is charged.

abilities.name: Consuming Blaze
abilities.description: Ignite nearby enemies, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds. Basic Attacking burning enemies re-Ignites them. Cho is healed for 40 (+4% per level) when an enemy is Ignited.

abilities.name: Rune Bomb
abilities.description: Roll a bomb dealing 91 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in its path. Gall can use Runic Blast to detonate it to deal 221 (+4% per level) damage in an area.

abilities.name: Hammer of Twilight
abilities.description: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 (+4.5% per level) damage, pushing enemies away, and stuning them for 0.75 seconds. Passive:Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.

abilities.name: Upheaval
abilities.description: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 (+4% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Image Transmission
abilities.description: Activate to switch places with a target Mirror Image, removing most negative effects from Samuro and the Mirror Image.Type: Mobility: TeleportAffects: Self, ImagesTargeting: Unit TargetCast time: 0+0.125 secondsCast range: GlobalSamuro can not use Image Transmission on target Image that is Stunned, Silenced, in Stasis or in Time Stop.Using Image Transission to swap between Images puts Samuro and his Images in a special Stasis for 0.125 seconds, when the Ability is being cast, removing debuffs from them and making them briefly untargetable and immune to damage, regardless of which Image was targetted. All of Samuro's Mirror Images' Health is set to match the percentage of Samuro's current Health, when the swap is finished.Using Image Transmission during Wind Walk's Unrevealable period doesn't break Stealth, but using it after Unrevealable period is over will. Real Samuro retains Stealth over the swap.Advancing Strikes Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase Samuro's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.Advancing Strikes and the Talents enhancing it work independently on Samuro and each of his Mirror Images.

abilities.name: Mirror Image
abilities.description: Create 2 Mirror Images that deal 9 damage and have 50% of Samuro's current Health. Images last up to 18 seconds, and only two can be active at any one time. Mirror Image will remove most negative effects from Samuro.Type: Summon / Mobility: TeleportTargeting: No Target / Tracks Mouse CursorClamped: YesCast time: 0+0.125Cast range: 10Displacement: 3.5Mirror ImageSummon type: Heroic Pet / CloneHealth: 50% Attack damage: 9Damage scaling: 4.00%Attack Speed: 100%Attack Range: 100%Movement speed: 100% Sight radius: 100%Samuro appears in the direction of the player's Mouse Cursor, when Mirror Image is cast. Samuro and his Mirror Images spawn in an equilateral triangle around the point where Samuro was standing when the ability was cast.Using Mirror Image puts Samuro in  a special Stasis for 0.125 seconds when the Ability is being cast, removing debuffs from Samuro and making him briefly untargetable and immune to damage.Mirror Images deal the same type of damage than Samuro does.Mirror Images gain all benefits from Samuro's Trait and Talents affecting it.Mirror Images can be affected by Regeneration Globes' healing, but not pick them up themselves. The effect is not shared between Samuro and his Images.Killing Mirror Images rewards no XP or Takedown credit.All Mirror Images are destroyed, when real Samuro successfully Hearths.

abilities.name: Critical Strike
abilities.description: Samuro's next Basic Attack within 10 seconds will be a Critical Strike, dealing 50% increased damage. This also applies to Images, and does not break Wind Walk.Passive: Samuro and his Images deal a Critical Strike on every 4th Basic Attack.Type: Damage modifierAffects: Self, ImagesTargeting: No TargetCast time: InstantBonus damage from Critical Strike and all Talents enhancing it is dealt in Physical Damage unless otherwise noted.

abilities.name: Wind Walk
abilities.description: Enter Stealth for up to 10 seconds or until you attack, use an Ability, or take damage. While Stealthed, your Movement Speed is increased by 25% and you can pass through other units.Samuro is Unrevealable for the first second of Wind Walk.Type: MobilityAffects: SelfTargeting: No TargetCast time: InstantProperties: Stealth, UnrevealableUsing Mirror Image and Mounting during Unrevealable period will break Stealth once the period ends.

abilities.name: Bladestorm
abilities.description: Cause a Bladestorm of destructive force around Samuro for 4 seconds, making him Unstoppable and dealing 235 damage per second to nearby enemies.Type: DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: No TargetCast time: 0+ChRadius: 4.25Properties: UnstoppableTickrate: 5 / second (x20)Damage per tick: 47Reactivate: Bladestorm Cancel - Cancel BladestormBladestorm can be ended prematurely by reactivating the ability.Samuro can move, but not use any abilities, while Bladestorm is active.

abilities.name: Illusion Master
abilities.description: Mirror Images can be controlled individually or as a group and their damage is increased by 100%.Passive: Image Transmission's cooldown is reduced to 10 seconds.Type: Damage modifierAffects: ImagesIllusion Master active shares cooldown with Image Transmission, and has all the same properties.Mirror Images have a copy of Illusion Master active and Image Transmission, both of which swap the Image using it with Samuro. The cooldown is shared between Samuro and all his Images.Mirror Images can Mount, Hearth and drink from Healing Fountains. The effect and cooldowns are independent from Samuro and his other Images, including those that have expired.Images can fake capturing Objectives.A Mirror Image Hearthing does not destroy any Mirror Images, but real Samuro Hearthing still does.

abilities.name: Lion's Fang
abilities.description: Create a shockwave that travels in a straight line, dealing 150 damage and Slowing enemies by 35% for 1.5 seconds. Each enemy hit heals Varian for 35, increased to 140 against Heroes.Type: Damage / HealingScaling: 4.00% (both)Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: Clamping, Piercing Skillshot, SlowCast time: 0.125+0 secondsRange: 10.65Hitbox: 0.875x2.4Projectile speed: 18

abilities.name: Parry

Basic Attacks whose damage has been changed to Spell damage, like Kel'thuzad's "Chilling Touch", and percent-based damage, like "Giant Killer", will deal full damage.Does not prevent on-hit effects (Attack modifiers) such as a Keep's Movement and Attack Slows or Lunara's "Nature's Toxin".

abilities.name: Charge

1.name: Hot Pursuit
1.description: When at 10 stacks of Hatred, the Movement Speed bonus increases to 20% total and Valla gains 4 Mana per second.
1.longDescription: When at 10 stacks of Hatred, the Movement Speed bonus increases to 20% total and Valla gains 4 Mana per second.

4.name: Puncturing Arrow
4.description: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Hungering Arrow increases its damage by 5, up to a maximum of 100. Reward: After gaining 100 bonus damage, gain an additional 75 bonus damage and Hungering Arrow also bounces 1 additional time.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Hungering Arrow increases its damage by 5, up to a maximum of 100. Reward: After gaining 100 bonus damage, gain an additional 75 bonus damage and Hungering Arrow also bounces 1 additional time.

4.name: Creed of the Hunter
4.description: Increases Attack Speed by 10%. Quest: Use 100 Basic Attacks against Heroes. Reward: Hatred grants an additional 2% Basic Attack Damage per stack.
4.longDescription: Increases Attack Speed by 10%. Quest: Use 100 Basic Attacks against Heroes. Reward: Hatred grants an additional 2% Basic Attack Damage per stack.

7.name: Death Dealer
7.description: Increases Vault Basic Attack damage bonus from 6% to 14% per stack of Hatred. If this attack kills its victim, the Mana cost and cooldown of Vault are refunded.
7.longDescription: Increases Vault Basic Attack damage bonus from 6% to 14% per stack of Hatred. If this attack kills its victim, the Mana cost and cooldown of Vault are refunded.

7.name: Repeating Arrow
7.description: The cooldown for Hungering Arrow is reset when Vault is used.
7.longDescription: The cooldown for Hungering Arrow is reset when Vault is used.

10.name: Strafe
10.description: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 62 damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4.0 seconds.
10.longDescription: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 62 damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4.0 seconds.

13.longDescription: Valla heals for 75% of the damage dealt to Heroes by Hungering Arrow.

abilities.name: Hatred

abilities.name: Multishot
abilities.description: Deal 172 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area.

abilities.name: Vault
abilities.description: Dash to the target area. Valla's next Basic Attack within 2 second deals 6% increased damage per stack of Hatred.

abilities.description: Tassadar becomes Invulnerable and Unrevealable for 2 seconds. While shifted, he has 25% increased Movement Speed.Type: Status effectAffects: SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Stasis, Stealth, UnrevealableCast time: Instant
